snippet: The ban in Urumqi formalizes rules that the police have been trying to impose on Muslims, such as a prohibition against long beards on men.
abstract: Ban on Islamic veils in public is approved by officials in Urumqi, capital of western Chinese region of Xinjiang, formalizing set of rules that city’s police officers have been trying to impose on Muslims.
lead_paragraph: The ban in Urumqi formalizes rules that the police have been trying to impose on Muslims, such as a prohibition against long beards on men.

headline.main: Capital of Tense Chinese Region Outlaws Islamic Veils in Public
headline.print_headline: China: City Bans Veils in Public
